unlocks.message:
Your Gem evolves based on your experiences.
Tap through all 5 levels to see how.
unlocks.heading: LISTENED FOR 1,000 MINUTES
unlocks.title: Streaming PRODUCT unlocks a new element for your Gem

unlocks.message: Real-world experiences can evolve your Gem too.
unlocks.heading: FOUND HIDDEN OBJECT
unlocks.title: Finding the hidden pool toy at Honest Jon's unlocks a rare element

unlocks.message: Surprise easter eggs can unlock new elements.
unlocks.heading: FOUND SPECIAL LOCATION
unlocks.title: Visiting Heaven's alley with friends unlocks a surprise element for each of you

unlocks.message: Fans can work together on community listening.
unlocks.heading: 1 MILLION COMMUNITY STREAMS
unlocks.title: Owning the Gem during this milestone unlocks a limited element

unlocks.message: Piece by piece, a Gem becomes increasingly personal to its collector.
unlocks.heading: SECRET ELEMENT UNLOCKED
unlocks.title: Unlocking multiple elements reveals a secret bonus

unlocks.message: In the end, your Gem tells your story with the album.
